channel.title: How to change the XP rate of.......?
channel.description:
Hi all,
I am trying to change the experience rate given to a player when you click on a haybale or a dummy. Can someone help me?
I am using a fearscape source, but I am willing to try anything.
Thanks.

item.title: How to change the XP rate of.......?
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

This is not a flam or a spam.
This is a usual question.
Just becaue you’ve maybe seen this question before doesn’t mean it’s a flam or a spam.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the XP rate of.......?
item.dc:creator: @s3rv3r s3rv3r
item.description:
@s3rv3r wrote:

EDIT: Here-- Open up client.java. Press ctrl+f then type in the box you hit the dummy— you should see

setAnimation(1810); addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer += 15; sendMessage("You gain attack Exp ;)");
Change the addskillxp((800 -to what you want. example 800 change to 10000 for 10k exp each click

Read full topic
